certifications.title: A Robust Segmentation of Retinal Fluids from OCT Images using MCFAR-net
certifications.description: Published in Elsevier's Neurocomputing journal, this paper presents MCFAR-net, a novel deep learning approach for accurate segmentation of retinal fluids from OCT images.

certifications.title: A Depth-Search Based Lightweight CAR Network for Brain Tumor Segmentation
certifications.description: Published in Elsevier's Neuroscience Informatics journal, this work proposes a computationally efficient CAR network architecture for precise segmentation of brain tumors from MR images.

certifications.title: Microsoft Certified: Azure Fundamentals
certifications.description: Earners of the Azure Fundamentals certification have demonstrated foundational level knowledge of cloud services and how those services are provided with Microsoft Azure.
